item.description:
Join us for a fun holiday shindig! We’ll be celebrating with a healthy potluck dinner, because holidays are happier when you’re feeling healthy.

This CT Health Foodies event is a wonderful way to meet other people committed to make positive changes to their lifestyle and diet. We’ll be playing fun games that will make it easy for new folks to make new friends and for our regular members get to know each other better.

During our team trivia challenge, you’ll learn about local resources for healthy living or -- if none of the info is new to you -- you’ll get a chance to show off how knowledgeable you are.

The potluck will include Aruna Chocolates, which are organic, raw, vegan, super delicious, and made with superfoods, lots of love, and no refined sugar. (http://arunachocolates.wordpress.com/)

***********************************************
Schedule for the evening:
7:15 pm: Delicious Potluck Dinner begins.
9:00 pm - 9:30 on: Hanging out and cleaning up

About the potluck dinner:
-Many people have dietary restrictions. Please be mindful as you prepare your dish, and list the ingredients on a note card. Note cards will be available at the event.

-This a zero-waste event. Please bring your own plate, utensils, and water bottle.
***********************************************
Donations between $2-$5 requested.
***********************************************
FREE PARKING! In the back of the ArtSpace building. Ignore "Resident Parking Only" signs. Parking is allowed during this event. Enter through the back entrance by the murals.
***********************************************
This CT Health Foodies event is part of an ongoing series of monthly potluck dinners and talks held on the second Tuesday of the month at ArtSpace in downtown Hartford. We are a diverse group, and we respect everyone’s food choices.
***********************************************
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the back entrance by the murals. Walk down the long corridor. At the end of the corridor, on the right, you will see the room where we will be meeting.
item.name: Healthy, Happy Holiday Party!
